item.description:
Meeting place is at the circular drive in front of Gloucester High School, by 7 p.m. (Parade starts around 7:30p.m.) If you'd like to come just for the fireworks, let me know and I'll give you my cellphone number so you can find us in the crowd. Look forward to seeing you all there!

Parking:
If you arrive early enough there is plenty of parking in the Gloucester High School Parking lot.

7:30 p.m.
Boat "Parade of Lights" sailing down the Annisquam River to Gloucester's Inner Harbor.

9:15 p.m.
Fireworks Display over Gloucester Harbor. (time approximate, following the Boat Parade)

Schooner Festival


Suggestions for what to bring:

Camera gear including tripod for the fireworks and a cable release if you have one.
Bug spray (seriously!!)
Bottled Water
item.name: Special Event: Gloucester Boat "Parade of Lights" and Fireworks
